text: "Headlines" is the second single off Canadian rapper Drake's second studio album Take Care. The song was released on August 9, 2011. On December 3, 2011, a music video for the song was released. It featured Drake rapping at different areas in Toronto including the Rogers Centre, going up the glass elevator in the CN Tower, and at Guild Park. ==References== ==Other websites== *"Headlines" on YouTube Category:2011 songs Category:Drake (musician) songs
title: Headlines (song)
